channel.title: Morgan's Learning Podcast

item.title: Episode 001: Client Service Automation Strategy
item.description: A comprehensive breakdown of the three core service patterns for scaling client automation: Social Media Engagement, Data Mining & Lead Generation, and Email Management & Customer Service. We cover the implementation timeline, structural changes needed, and how template thinking will save weeks of development time for future clients.
item.itunes:summary: A comprehensive breakdown of the three core service patterns for scaling client automation: Social Media Engagement, Data Mining & Lead Generation, and Email Management & Customer Service.
